title: Basic Tomato Sauce
summary: Need a caveman, gluten free, primal, and whole 30 sauce? Basic Tomato Sauce could be an amazing recipe to try. This recipe serves 10 and costs 28 cents per serving. One serving contains 57 calories, 2g of protein, and 3g of fat. A mixture of tomato paste, carrot or, celery, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so scrumptious. Many people made this recipe, and 272 would say it hit the spot. It is brought to you by Simply Recipes. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 35 minutes. Taking all factors into account, this recipe earns a spoonacular score of 77%, which is solid. If you like this recipe, you might also like recipes such as Basic Nomato Sauce (Tomato Free Tomato Sauce), Basic Tomato Sauce, and Basic Tomato Sauce.
